name: Azure Realms Calendar Pack
description: Calendars for the Azure Realms setting, including the Axiem and Shaymian Calendars and their Lunar Calendars.
author: MTVExtreme

calendars.name: Axiem Calendar (The Azure Realms)
calendars.description: The standard calendar of Axiem, featuring twelve 32-day months. Used throughout the Azure Realms setting in TTRPG campaigns.
calendars.author: MTVExtreme

calendars.name: Shaymian Calendar (The Azure Realms)
calendars.description: The standard calendar of Shaymia, featuring twelve 32-day months. Used throughout the Azure Realms setting in TTRPG campaigns.
calendars.author: MTVExtreme
